message: if you go to the paid one, this issue would be gone
be sure to check it out
I just published a new app on the store, Hackman. It's hangman for hackers with topics revolving around startups and programming languages.

1) After completing a word list it shouldn't go to the next word list or start that word list over instead of telling me to buy a new word list every time i decline it 
2) Every time I get a word wrong then go onto the next word, it is the same word
3) 3 achievements are impossible to get for the free version unless you upgrade so that is kinda dumb
4) it should have a shuffle mode so i don't have to go to the settings to change the word list
otherwise is meh it is ok game but nothing i would pay for or get an upgrade it
I can probably say that because the free version only have 10 words per categories so the chances of you getting the next word the same as the previous one is high

the free version is basically just to try the game out.. so the functionality is really as it is... if you want achievements, more words, less repetition of words.. buy it.. if you think it's not worthed.. then just enjoy the free trial
I just pushed a minor bug fix for 1,2,and 3... thx for the input
